headline.main: PARIS PRESS ASKS FRENCH 'CHOICE'; Russia and Britain Losing, 'New Europe' Is Near, So Why Wait? It Demands STEPS TAKEN ARE LISTED Deat Says Signing of Berlin Pact Would Mean Admission to 'Continental Family'

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 27 -- "Very important events, are preparing. At this time last year in the weeks between Montoire [where Marshal Henri Philippe Petain, French Chief of State, met Reichsfuehrer Hitler on Oct. 24] and Dec. 13 [when Pierre Laval was ousted from the Vichy government] we lived through the same hopes and same fears.
abstract: Urges full French collaboration with Germany
